sql: SELECT MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating, MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM movie_info_idx mi_idx, movie_keyword mk, title t WHERE mi_idx.info > '3.0' AND t.production_year < 2006 AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;
hint_str:
/*+ MergeJoin(t mi_idx mk)
 MergeJoin(t mi_idx)
 IndexScan(t)
 IndexScan(mi_idx)
 BitmapScan(mk)
 Leading(((t mi_idx) mk)) */
